author: Philip FONG
title: Shohei Ohtani hit a home run for the Los Angeles Dodgers against the Chicago Cubs in Tokyo on Wednesday
text:
Shohei Ohtani hit a home run for the Los Angeles Dodgers against the Chicago Cubs in Tokyo on Wednesday
- Philip FONG
- Updated
Tags
As featured on
Shohei Ohtani hit a home run but Roki Sasaki had a wobbly Major League Baseball debut as the Los Angeles Dodgers beat the Chicago Cubs 6-3 in Tokyo on Wednesday.
